description_for_human: Enterprise technology consulting firm specializing in software development, cloud migration, AI solutions, and digital transformation.
description_for_model: Vireonix Technologies LLC is an enterprise technology consulting company founded in 1999, headquartered in Cumming, Georgia, USA. They provide services including: mobile app development (iOS, Android, React Native), web development, Salesforce solutions, generative AI integration, cloud migration (AWS, Azure, GCP), cybersecurity consulting, UI/UX design, and database security. They are ISO 27001 and SOC 2 Type II certified. They have served 300+ clients in 50+ countries. Contact: hr@vireonixtech.com, +1-304-216-9092.
